lexUnit.name: frown.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: [verb] furrow one's brows in an expression indicating disapproval, displeasure, or concentration. [noun] an expression of this type

sentence.text: Even so , a little frown of apprehension clouded her face as her thoughts strayed to the hours ahead .
It was probably Charlotte 's frown of puzzlement that prompted her to add : ` Emerson 's wife . "
A faint frown of doubt brought Lucenzo 's brows together .
` Do be careful , love , " said his wife , a frown on her forehead and a worried tone to her voice .
` Forgotten ? " asked Joan , her tinkling laughter deepening the frown on the other girl 's face .
It 's no surprise I had a frown on my face . "
A look of relief replaced the frown on Ellen 's face .
The driver 's frown disappeared , to be replaced with a roguish , knowing grin .
" He raised his arms , looked at the woman 's bitter frown , then at the sea of young faces that formed the audience .
` Can you hear it ? " he asked , his frown returning to mar the handsome features .
` I have no silver ! " he shouted back , ignoring Corbett 's warning frown .
The Sergeant 's deepening frown showed he 'd reached his limit of forbearance .
Penny cast an unwelcoming frown in the direction of the steel grey November sky , and stepped carefully onto the pavement from the Earl 's Court mansion block in which she lived .
Thoughts of Peter etched a frown to her forehead .
His brief puzzled frown hardened into furious realisation .
Staring at her , a puzzled frown in his eyes , he took a step back .
Juliet stared at him , a puzzled frown on her face .
A slight frown of disappointment passed over the photographer 's face .
A slight frown crinkled just above Mr Nightingale 's gold-rimmed spectacles .
He loosed her arm and stood looking at her , a slight frown on his brow .
She affected a small frown of concentration .
Rory was smiling as the small , plump figure scuttled out of the dressing-room , but the smile quickly changed to a thoughtful frown .
And a worried frown crossed his face , at the thought of her past dangers and the possibility of new ones .
Her worried frown deepened .
` Yes , that 's right , " she said , her worried frown fading .
Jilly Jonathan gave a quick little frown .
The boy gave a small frown .
Ace gave her a mock frown .
Bull O'Malley 's heavy eyebrows were drawn down in a confused frown .
As she scanned the titles Polly 's brows contracted in a puzzled frown .
She waited for him to elaborate , but when he remained silent her forehead creased in an irritated frown .
The lumpy face creased into a puzzled frown .
He looked down on her , his brow drawn into an angry frown .
" His face creased into a fierce frown of concentration , then he let it go , shaking his head .
He leaned forward as he spoke , his tanned forehead pleated into a concerned frown and his mouth set in a line of sober sincerity .
She always wears a frown
He wore the slightest frown .
Even Devitt wore a puzzled frown .
` Book ? " asked Jan with a frown .
Serious business , he thought with a frown as he picked up the receiver .
A frown of puzzlement creased his brow when he looked at the cover .
A deep frown creased Rory 's smooth brow .
Rory stared at the figures on the page , a frown of deep concentration creasing her features .
His frown deepened , then transformed itself into a radiant grin .
Theda 's frown deepened .
A frown of exasperation lined her brow as she shook her dark head in bewilderment .
